about.title: About Me
about.description:
🚀 Full Stack Developer with an Educator's Heart

I blend my experience as an English teacher with my passion for web development to create digital solutions that don't just work - they communicate.

💻 Technical Stack:
• Frontend: JavaScript, React ⚛️, HTML5, CSS3
• Backend: Node.js 🟢, Express
• Databases: SQL 📊, MongoDB

✨ My Unique Edge: 
I translate technical complexity into clarity. My background in education enables me to communicate complex ideas precisely, lead diverse teams, and deeply understand end-user needs.

🔍 My Philosophy:
Clean code. Intuitive interfaces. Solutions that solve real-world problems.

🌱 Currently exploring new technologies and seeking challenging projects where my unique skill combination can make a meaningful impact.

Looking for a developer who combines technical excellence with exceptional communication skills? Let's talk!
